I love Junior's! They have really great meat for their tacos which is so important for a strong base. Good margs and prices!  I honestly don't know how...
Great spot for taco Tuesday & Happy Hour. Happy Hour is 3:00pm-6:00pm. Even better during patio season, tons of outdoor seating!
